CustomField.description: This field is used internally to generate the "Duplicate Record" field. It generates display text for a contact including the full name linked to the contact and the account name (if there is one) linked to the account.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( '/' & CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__c, CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__r.FirstName & IF( NOT( ISBLANK( CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__r.FirstName ) ), ' ', '' ) & CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__r.LastName, '_self') & IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__r.AccountId ) ), NOT( ISNULL( CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__r.AccountId ) ) ), ' at ' & HYPERLINK( '/' & CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__r.AccountId, CRMfusionDBR101__Contact__r.Account.Name, '_self' ), '' )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The full name and account name of the potential duplicate contact.
CustomField.label: Contact Display Field
